name: Country Music Christmas Quiz | Country Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which artist recorded the song 'When It's Christmas Time in Texas'?
questions.explanation:
George Strait.

	This is on George Strait's first Christmas album.

questions.text: Which of the following did not sing a duet on Alan Jackson's Christmas album entitled 'Honky Tonk Christmas'?
questions.explanation:
Merle Haggard.

	Even though Alan did Merle Haggard's 'If I Make It Through December' he did not have Merle sing with him. Alison Krause was featured on 'The Angels Cried'. The Chipmunks were featured on 'Santa's Gonna Come in a Pickup Truck' and Keith Whitley was featured on 'There's a New Kid in Town'.

questions.text: Who recorded the classic Christmas song 'Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree'?
On Lorrie Morgan's Christmas album 'Merry Christmas From London' she recorded a song entitled 'Up On Santa Claus Mountain'. What relative of hers wrote that song?
questions.explanation:
Her Father.

	The song was written by her father, George Morgan.

questions.text: According to the Tractors, what is Santa Claus coming in?
questions.correct: A Boogie Woogie Choo Choo Train
questions.explanation:
A Boogie Woogie Choo Choo Train.

	They re-wrote the lyrics to 'Baby Like to Rock It' to turn it into a Christmas song.

questions.text: True or False: Collin Raye includes his Christmas Song 'The Gift' on his Christmas album entitled 'The Gift'.
questions.explanation:
False & f.

	If you want this song, the Christmas album 'Gift' by Jim Brickman, is one of the places to find it.

questions.text: Which Christmas song does Vince Gill sing with his daughter?
questions.correct: Let There Be Peace on Earth
options: Santa Claus Is Coming to Town
I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus
questions.explanation: Let There Be Peace on Earth.

questions.text: What is the title of Martina McBride's first Christmas album?
What was the name of Garth Brooks' first Christmas album?
questions.explanation:
Beyond the Season.

	His first was 'Beyond the Season' and his second was 'The Magic of Christmas' which has been re-released this year with some new songs on it from the movie 'Call me Claus'.

questions.text: Which artist recorded the Christmas albums 'O Holy Night' and 'My Heart is Bethlehem'?
questions.explanation:
John Berry.

	IMHO, these are 2 of the very best Country Christmas Albums there are and John Berry's version of 'O Holy Night' is one of the best versions of this song ever recorded.
